meanings.sent1: The telescope captured a stellar image of the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The stellar constellations shone brightly in the dark sky.
meanings.sent3: The aliens traveled in a stellar spaceship powered by starlight.
meanings.sent4: Her performance in the school play was as stellar as a shooting star.
meanings.sent5: The astronomer's passion for studying stellar phenomena was unmatched.

meanings.sent1: The chef received stellar reviews for his delicious dishes.
meanings.sent2: The team's stellar effort led them to victory in the championship.
meanings.sent3: The cat's stellar ability to catch mice impressed the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her stellar intelligence shone through in every subject at school.
meanings.sent5: The artist's stellar talent was evident in every brushstroke of the painting.
